docs.lead_paragraph: An extraordinary series of veterinary and military measures have contained within one Texas county an anthrax epidemic that health officials said threatened to devastate the livestock industry in the nation's largest cattle-producing state.

headline.main: Anthrax Epidemic Is Contained in One Texas County

docs.abstract: outbreak of anthrax epidemic in Falls County, Tex, discussed; effects of disease on livestock described; successful health and mil measures which have confined disease to Falls County area noted (L)
docs.snippet: An extraordinary series of veterinary and military measures have contained within one Texas county an anthrax epidemic that health officials said threatened to devastate the livestock industry in the nation's largest cattle-producing state.

byline.original: By LAWRENCE K. ALTMANSpecial to The New York Times
